output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an attacker to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens owned by the attacker, due to a lack of overflow checks.
The transferFrom function allows unauthorized transfers, due to incorrect conditions for verifying sufficient funds and allowances.
The toOwner function allows any user to claim ownership and funds, due to a missing access control check.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens, causing a drastic decrease in token value.
The claimThrone function is vulnerable to integer overflow, allowing the attacker to exploit the overflow and take over the contract.
